Terpilihnya Iwan Bule Sebagai Ketum PSSI Dinilai Bukan Kejutan
03 Nov 2019, 01:09 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Terpilihnya Mochamad Iriawan sebagai Ketua Umum PSSI periode 2019-2023 tak menghadirkan kejutan bagi Koordinator Save Our Soccer, Akmal Marhali. Menurutnya, terpilihnya tokoh yang karib disapa Iwan Bule ini sudah bisa diprediksi sejak jauh hari.
"Terpilihnya Pak Mochammad Iriawan sesuai prediksi. Kemenangannya karena nyaris tak ada lawan sepadan bagi Pak Iriawan. Ini tak lepas dari keputusan La Nyalla Mattalitti, yang menarik diri dari Kongres," kata Akmal, pada Bola.net.
Menurut Akmal, ada hal yang lebih menarik untuk dicermati ketimbang terpilihnya Iwan Bule. Hal tersebut, adalah masih adanya intrik, yang bahkan sampai berujung walk out sejumlah calon ketua umum, pada ajang kongres. Akmal menilai bahwa ini adalah gambaran wajah sepak bola Indonesia, yang bopeng dan berada dalam situasi darurat.
"Ketika para elit di atas tidak mampu memberikan keteladanan dan contoh dalam koridor sportivitas dan fairplay, sulit berharap di level akar rumput akan berubah lebih baik," kata mantan jurnalis olahraga ini.
Iwan Bule terpilih sebagai Ketua Umum PSSI periode 2019 hingga 2023. Dalam pemilihan di Kongres Luar Biasa, yang digelar di Jakarta, Sabtu (02/11), ia menang telak dari para pesaingnya. Dari 85 voter, Iwan mendapat 82 suara. Sementara, Arif Putra Wicaksono dan para calon lainnya tak mendapat satu pun suara. Tiga suara lain dianggap tidak sah.
Sebagai pendamping Ketua Umum, terpilih Iwan Budianto dan Cucu Somantri sebagai wakil. Iwan mendapat 74 suara, sedangkan Cucu mendapat 81 suara.

The Election of Iwan Bule as the Chairman of PSSI is considered not a surprise
Nov 3 2019, 01:09 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The election of Mochamad Iriawan as General Chair of PSSI 2019-2023 did not present a surprise for Save Our Soccer Coordinator, Akmal Marhali. According to him, the election of a close figure called Iwan Bule can be predicted long ago.
"The election of Pak Mochammad Iriawan was in accordance with his prediction. His victory was because there were almost no equal opponents for Pak Iriawan. This could not be separated from the decision of La Nyalla Mattalitti, who withdrew from Congress," Akmal said on Bola.net.
According to Akmal, there are more interesting things to be observed than the election of Iwan Bule. That is, there is still intrigue, which even led to a walk out of a number of candidates for chairman, at the congress event. Akmal considered that this was a picture of the face of Indonesian football, which was pockmarked and in an emergency situation.
"When the elites above are not able to set an example and examples in the corridors of sportsmanship and fair play, it's hard to hope that at the grassroots level it will change for the better," said the former sports journalist.
Iwan Bule was elected as General Chair of PSSI from 2019 to 2023. In the election at the Extraordinary Congress, which was held in Jakarta, Saturday (02/11), he won a landslide victory over his competitors. From 85 voters, Iwan got 82 votes. Meanwhile, Arif Putra Wicaksono and the other candidates did not get any votes. Three other votes are considered invalid.
As a companion to the General Chair, Iwan Budianto and Cucu Somantri were chosen as representatives. Iwan got 74 votes, while Cucu got 81 votes.
